Move slowly into a space in the traffic flow

When reversing from a driveway and your view is not clear

Answers.Answer: Drive over the lines as soon as the train has passed
Slow down and then drive over the lines

Stop and if no train is coming you may drive over the lines

Question: What should you do when you come up to a one-lane bridge?

Answers.Answer: Sound your vehicle horn and drive slowly over the bridge
Turn your vehicle headlights on and drive quickly over the bridge
Slow down and check for any oncoming vehicles before driving on
Drive on and make sure any oncoming vehicles reverse off the bridge

Question: A warrant of fitness is to show:

Answers.Answer: the year the vehicle was made
if the driver has had any crashes
how many times the vehicle has crashed
that the vehicle was roadworthy at the time of checking

Question: A police officer has the power to arrest you for:

Answers.Answer: failing to supply your correct name and address
having no warrant of fitness for your vehicle
failing to signal a right turn
failing to stop at a stop sign

Question: If you have to drive at a slow speed which may hold up other vehicles, what should you do?

Answers.Answer: Keep as close as you can to the centre of the road
Keep as close as you can to the left side of the road
Make the traffic behind you slow down to the speed that you are driving at
Drive down the middle of the road so that any vehicles behind you can pass on the left

Question: If you miss your exit on a motorway, you should:

Answers.Answer: use the flush median strip and reverse back to the exit
make a U-turn back to the exit
drive on to the next exit
slowly stop and reverse back to the exit
